title: Mobile Lifecycle Details
description: Application lifecycle information recorded via an ExperienceEvent that is specific to the Mobile channel. Includes field definitions for automatically collected data by the AEP Edge mobile extension library.

xdm:mobileApplication.title: Mobile Application
xdm:mobileApplication.description: Application information related to an ExperienceEvent, including the name of the application, app version, launches, and closures.

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: Information about the mobile device the application lifecycle event observation occurred in, including device type and model.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The type of the application environment.

xdm:operatingSystem.title: Operating system
xdm:operatingSystem.description: The name of the operating system used when the observation was made. The attribute should not contain any version information such as '10.5.3', but instead contain 'edition' designations such as 'Ultimate' or 'Professional'.

xdm:operatingSystemVersion.title: Operating system version
xdm:operatingSystemVersion.description: The full version identifier for the operating system used when the observation was made. Versions are generally numerically composed but may be in a vendor defined format.

xdm:operatingSystemVendor.title: Operating system vendor
xdm:operatingSystemVendor.description: The name of the operating system vendor used when the observation was made.

xdm:colorDepth.title: Color depth
xdm:colorDepth.description: The number of bits used for each color component of a single pixel.

xdm:viewportHeight.title: Viewport height
xdm:viewportHeight.description: The vertical size in pixels of the window the experience was displayed inside. For a web view event, the browser viewport height.

xdm:viewportWidth.title: Viewport width
xdm:viewportWidth.description: The horizontal size in pixels of the window the experience was displayed inside. For a web view event, the browser viewport width.

xdm:carrier.title: Mobile network carrier
xdm:carrier.description: A mobile network carrier or MNO, also known as a wireless service provider, wireless carrier, cellular company, or mobile network carrier, is a provider of services wireless communications that owns or controls all the elements necessary to sell and deliver services to an end user.

xdm:ipV4.title: IPv4
xdm:ipV4.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

xdm:ipV6.title: IPv6
xdm:ipV6.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

xdm:domain.title: Domain
xdm:domain.description: The domain of the users ISP.

xdm:ISP.title: Internet service provider
xdm:ISP.description: The name of the user's internet service provider.

dc:language.title: Language
dc:language.description:
The language of the environment to represent the user's linguistic, geographical, or cultural preferences for data presentation.
Languages are specified in language code as defined in [IETF RFC 3066](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3066.txt), which is part of BCP 47, which is used elsewhere in XDM.
